definitions.definition: Speaking a language one does not know, or speaking elaborate but apparently meaningless speech , while in a trance -like state (or, supposedly, under the influence of a deity or spirits ); speaking in tongues .
Synonym of xenoglossy ( “ knowledge of a language one has never learned ” ) .

main_definition: Speaking a language one does not know, or speaking elaborate but apparently meaningless speech , while in a trance -like state (or, supposedly, under the influence of a deity or spirits ); speaking in tongues . [from late 19th c.]
secondary_definitions: Synonym of xenoglossy ( “ knowledge of a language one has never learned ” ) .
